eadid.publicid: -//Stanford University::Department of Special Collections and University Archives//TEXT (US::CSt::::[Ernest Ropiequet Hilgard papers])//EN

titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ernest Ropiequet Hilgard Papers
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives
publicationstmt.p: Copyright © 2015 The Board of Trustees of the Leland Stanford Junior University. All rights reserved.

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Papers document his professional career as researcher (focusing on hypnosis) and professor at Stanford University; included are correspondence, research files, articles and papers, lectures, reprints, course materials, records from Professor Hilgard's extensive Stanford committee activities, and his memoirs (1991). Collection includes a small number of videos, audio tapes, and photographs.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

acqinfo.p: Gift of Professor Ernest Hilgard, 1979, 1995, and 2000.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: Some of the hypnosis study materials received in 2000 are restricted pending review.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Ernest Ropiequet Hilgard Papers (SC0210). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Professor of Psychology and Education at Stanford, since 1933; Dean of Graduate Division, 1951-1955.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Papers document his professional career as researcher (focusing on hypnosis) and professor at Stanford University; included are correspondence, research files, articles and papers, lectures, reprints, course materials, records from Professor Hilgard's extensive Stanford committee activities, and his memoirs (1991). Collection includes a small number of videos, audio tapes, and photographs.
